title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, the label's height does not change immediately.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points".
OB: When the font size of the label is modified to "18 points", the label's height remains the same as before the modification.
EB: When the font size of the label is modified to "18 points", the label's height should be adjusted to accommodate the larger font size.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Add a label to the application.
3. Modify the font size of the label to "18 points". Observe that the label's height does not change immediately.
